title: Barcelona back on top of La Liga as Lionel Messi hat-trick beats Granada
description: Lionel Messi’s first hat trick of the season helped Barcelona beat Granada 4-0 and take a provisional lead of La Liga on Saturday.Messi scored twice within the first 15 minutes at the Camp Nou, and added his third in the second half as Barcelona cruised to victory. Neymar completed the scoring late on.The victory lifts Barcelona one point above Atlético Madrid, who play fifth-placed Celta Vigo on Sunday.Barcelona will have one game in hand after the end of the 19th round this weekend.Real Madrid, in third place, are five points behind Barcelona. They host Deportivo La Coruña late on Saturday, with Zinedine Zidane, who replaced the fired Rafa Benítez this week, as their new coach.
